long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jotters is a Chrome extension that makes taking quick notes in your browser simple and convenient.

Easy Access
  - Open a new tab to access Jotters in your browser.
  - Click the extension button to open Jotters as a popup.

Focus Mode
  - Pin Jotters to the top of the screen to keep your notes always visible.

Offline Access
  - Notes are stored locally in your browser, no internet needed.
  - It's fully offline, ensuring only you can see your notes.
  - Don't worry, your notes remain safe even if you delete your browser history and cache!

More Features
  - Light and dark mode
  - Download as text file
  - Find and replace
  - Keyboard shortcut and multi-cursor (You will love this if you're a programmer)
  - Autosave: Your notes is saved automatically
And many more features to come!

Jotters is designed with simplicity and efficiency in mind.

If you are the type of person who likes to:
  - Write down random notes
  - Copy and paste text from the web
  - Code using keyboard shortcuts and multi-cursors

Then Jotters is for you. The goal of Jotters is not to be an app for note-taking with tons of complex formatting and text styling, but a simple note-taking app that can be accessed quickly and used easily.

You don't have to navigate to a different app or go to a specific website to see or write a note. You just need to open a new tab in your browser, and Jotters is ready to use. Or even better, open it as a pop-up, so you don't even have to switch tabs!

Another cool thing about Jotters is that if you're used to VSCode (or Sublime), you might be familiar with these shortcuts:
  - Ctrl + X: Cut a line
  - Ctrl + F: Find (and replace)
  - Ctrl + D: Select multiple occurrence of a word
  - Ctrl + click: Multi-cursors
  - Shift + Alt + arrow down: Duplicate selected text

Jotters also supports these shortcuts, so you can write much faster! If you're not familiar with these shortcuts, I suggest you start using them—they will make your life much easier.

I hope Jotters makes your note-taking a breeze! If you have any feedback, I'd love to hear it! And stay tuned—more features are on the way!
